page.title: 06 SHORNE CHURCH
page.content: Shorne church is in Butchers Hill,just off the main road which runs through Shorne.The church holds about 200 people and is a very important part of the village community.There are 3 services each week on a Sunday.In the morning there is a family service incorporating a Sunday school.The church has six bells which are rung every Sunday.Each year the church holds a fete to raise money for the upkeep of the church.This year the money went towards the restoration of the organ. The Rev Dennis Runcorn is the vicar of Shorne.The church has a connection with Shorne primary school as it is a church of England school and Rev Runcorn visits the school each week.
